name: issue-tracker
description: use to track bugs, features, and more

scripts.start: concurrently "node gateway.js" "cd server && PORT=4001 node apiServer.js" "cd server && PORT=4002 node authServer.js" "cd server && PORT=4003 node frontendServer.js" "cd server && PORT=4004 node securityServer.js" "cd server && PORT=4005 node imageServer.js"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm install pm2 -g && pm2 start process.config.js
scripts.db:migrate:force: npm run db:rollback && npm run db:migrate

author: luan
